# Explore (Filling the Body) - Inception Data Sources

This document provides a reference mapping to help fill out the `3-explore-to-fill-the-body.md` template using the data generated during the Lean Inception workshop.

| Template Section | Inception Source Document | Sections to Reference |
| :--- | :--- | :--- |
| **1. The "What-About" Brainstorming** | `docs/inception/3-personas.md`<br>`docs/inception/4-empathy-map.md`<br>`docs/inception/5-brainstorming.md` | **Personas** (Variations in user types)<br>**Pains & Gains** (Sources for "sad paths" and "delighters")<br>**Brainstorming Grid** (Look for features labeled as "Idea" or "Risk") |
| **2. The Body of the Map** | `docs/inception/7-features-and-sequencing.md`<br>`docs/inception/6-user-journey-mapping.md` | **Waves/Features** (These are your primary User Stories)<br>**Journey Steps** (Context for where the feature fits) |
| **3. Story Definition (Narrative)** | `docs/inception/3-personas.md`<br>`docs/inception/1-product-vision-and-boundaries.md` | **Persona Details** (Who is the actor?)<br>**Product Goals** (The "So that" justification) |
| **4. Story Definition (Acceptance Criteria)** | `docs/inception/7-features-and-sequencing.md`<br>`docs/inception/1-product-vision-and-boundaries.md` | **Feature Definitions** (Implied functionality)<br>**Boundaries** (Constraints like "Does not support offline mode") |
| **5. Technical Notes & Risks** | `docs/inception/2-tradeoffs.md`<br>`docs/inception/5-brainstorming.md` | **Trade-off Sliders** (Performance/Security constraints)<br>**Brainstorming** (Technical cards or "How" questions) |
